General.Name: Taiwan Enterprise(Cayman)Co
General.Description: Tainan Enterprise (Cayman) Co., Limited designs, develops, produces, and sells clothing products in China. It offers urban fashion and casual men's and women's wear, sportswear, dresses, and accessories. The company markets and sells its products under the TONY JEANS, TONY UOMO, TJL, VOV, G-cut, Emely, and Emely Sweetie brand names. It also operates as sales representative of FILA brand apparel and accessories. Tainan Enterprise (Cayman) Co., Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: 802 West Bay Road, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1205
